QuestData.Title: Urok, Terror of the Wetlands
QuestData.Description:
You! You can help me!
I know, Sur'jan, $ghe:she; looks like a $c, but I know we can trust $ghim:her;.
Urok, de terror of de wetlands, is undead now. We have to put it down before it tries to destroy dis entire place.
Just give me a minute, and you will see dat Urok is bad news.
Shhh, Sur'jan, dey gonna see, dey are all gonna see!
QuestData.LogDescription: See Urok, Terror of the Wetlands.

Objectives.Objective: Urok, Terror of the Wetlands, observed
